name: Endless Yeti
description: This is a simple game where you collect loot and fight yetis in the specify order (1->2->3->4) to unlock the next floor.  The game has no ending and will loop until you loose all your health or die from going mad (madness = 100).  Combat is calculated with turns using your equipment and resources, but all of this happens instantly.   The game is played best in full screen.
